<Properties> <FormsID>TimePhasForm</FormsID> <ControlName>Customization</ControlName> <Key>2dcd1674-5e34-4d98-b493-c75747027376</Key> <PropertyName>Script</PropertyName> <PropertyValue>// ************************************************** // Custom code for TimePhasForm // Created: 5/24/2021 10:12:29 AM // ************************************************** // // REVISION LOG // // eb1 05/24/21 eric blackwelder @ cdi // default 3 checkboxes to false // add 3 columns to grid and populate them // add reference to: // Ice.Contracts.Lib.BOReader.dll // // **************************************************
extern alias Erp_Contracts_BO_PartPlantSearch; extern alias Erp_Contracts_BO_Part;
using System; using System.ComponentModel; using System.Data; using System.Diagnostics; using System.Windows.Forms; using Erp.Adapters; using Erp.UI; using Ice.Lib; using Ice.Adapters; using Ice.Lib.Customization; using Ice.Lib.ExtendedProps; using Ice.Lib.Framework; using Ice.Lib.Searches; using Ice.UI.FormFunctions;
using Ice.Proxy.Lib; using Infragistics.Win.UltraWinGrid;
public class Script { // ** Wizard Insert Location - Do Not Remove 'Begin/End Wizard Added Module Level Variables' Comments! ** // Begin Wizard Added Module Level Variables **
// End Wizard Added Module Level Variables **
// Add Custom Module Level Variables Here **
EpiUltraGrid grdList; private BOReaderImpl _boReader;
public void InitializeCustomCode() { // ** Wizard Insert Location - Do not delete 'Begin/End Wizard Added Variable Initialization' lines ** // Begin Wizard Added Variable Initialization
// End Wizard Added Variable Initialization
// Begin Wizard Added Custom Method Calls
// End Wizard Added Custom Method Calls
grdList = (EpiUltraGrid)csm.GetNativeControlReference("7908565c-cc3c-43d1-b85b-9921ad88fb89");
grdList.DisplayLayout.Bands[0].Columns.Add("RowUpdated"); grdList.DisplayLayout.Bands[0].Columns["RowUpdated"].Hidden = true;
grdList.DisplayLayout.Bands[0].Columns.Add("PartNum2" ,"Parent Item"); grdList.DisplayLayout.Bands[0].Columns["PartNum2"].CellActivation = Activation.ActivateOnly; grdList.DisplayLayout.Bands[0].Columns["PartNum2"].Header.VisiblePosition = 18;
grdList.DisplayLayout.Bands[0].Columns.Add("CustomerName" ,"Cust Name"); grdList.DisplayLayout.Bands[0].Columns["CustomerName"].CellActivation = Activation.ActivateOnly; grdList.DisplayLayout.Bands[0].Columns["CustomerName"].Header.VisiblePosition = 24;
grdList.DisplayLayout.Bands[0].Columns.Add("VendorName" ,"Supplier Name"); grdList.DisplayLayout.Bands[0].Columns["VendorName"].CellActivation = Activation.ActivateOnly; grdList.DisplayLayout.Bands[0].Columns["VendorName"].Header.VisiblePosition = 26;
grdList.InitializeRow += new InitializeRowEventHandler(this.ugTransactions_InitializeRow); _boReader = WCFServiceSupport.CreateImpl<BOReaderImpl>(oTrans.CoreSession, BOReaderImpl.UriPath);
}
public void DestroyCustomCode() { // ** Wizard Insert Location - Do not delete 'Begin/End Wizard Added Object Disposal' lines ** // Begin Wizard Added Object Disposal
// End Wizard Added Object Disposal
// Begin Custom Code Disposal
// End Custom Code Disposal
grdList.InitializeRow -= new InitializeRowEventHandler(this.ugTransactions_InitializeRow); _boReader = null;
}
private void TimePhasForm_Load(object sender, EventArgs args) { //06/26/21 comment out per robin's request: //Control c1 = csm.GetNativeControlReference("cdf4e0c8-4643-4c8b-9aaf-a53c47ce9985"); //EpiCheckBox chkSuggestions = (EpiCheckBox)c1; //chkSuggestions.Checked = false;
Control c2 = csm.GetNativeControlReference("7ceb719a-f574-4989-bf03-18263d5719f4"); EpiCheckBox chkTOSuggestions = (EpiCheckBox)c2; chkTOSuggestions.Checked = false;
Control c3 = csm.GetNativeControlReference("7f8e2894-a0c1-4ce6-a392-7bd7fc1faba0"); EpiCheckBox chkPlanContractInfo = (EpiCheckBox)c3; chkPlanContractInfo.Checked = false;
}
private void ugTransactions_InitializeRow(object sender, InitializeRowEventArgs e) { if((string)e.Row.Cells["RowUpdated"].Value != "YES") { try { if((int)e.Row.Cells["OrderNum"].Value != 0) { //MessageBox.Show("OrderNum: " + ((int)e.Row.Cells["OrderNum"].Value).ToString()); e.Row.Cells["CustomerName"].Value = "error"; DataTable dtSalesOrder = _boReader.GetList("Erp:BO:SalesOrder","OrderNum = " + (int)e.Row.Cells["OrderNum"].Value + "","OrderNum,CustomerName").Tables[0]; if(dtSalesOrder.Rows.Count > 0 ) { e.Row.Cells["CustomerName"].Value = dtSalesOrder.Rows[0]["CustomerName"]; } }
if((int)e.Row.Cells["PONum"].Value != 0) { //MessageBox.Show("PONum: " + ((int)e.Row.Cells["PONum"].Value).ToString()); e.Row.Cells["VendorName"].Value = "error"; DataTable dtPO = _boReader.GetList("Erp:BO:PO","PONum = " + (int)e.Row.Cells["PONum"].Value + "","PONum,VendorName").Tables[0]; if(dtPO.Rows.Count > 0 ) { e.Row.Cells["VendorName"].Value = dtPO.Rows[0]["VendorName"]; } }
if((string)e.Row.Cells["JobNum"].Value != "") { //MessageBox.Show("JobNum: " + ((int)e.Row.Cells["JobNum"].Value).ToString()); e.Row.Cells["PartNum2"].Value = "error"; DataTable dtJob = _boReader.GetList("Erp:BO:JobEntry","JobNum = '" + (string)e.Row.Cells["JobNum"].Value + "'","PartNum").Tables[0]; if(dtJob.Rows.Count > 0 ) { e.Row.Cells["PartNum2"].Value = dtJob.Rows[0]["PartNum"]; } }
} catch {}
e.Row.Cells["RowUpdated"].Value = "YES";
}
}
}
